title: Ctrl+F1 Inconsistent Functionality in Help Search Fields
description: The Ctrl+F1 shortcut is inconsistently functioning across various fields within the help search feature.
OB: Ctrl+F1 shortcut functionality is limited to specific fields in the help search, not universally applicable.
EB: Ctrl+F1 should uniformly function across all fields within the help search feature.
SR:
1. Open the help search feature.
2. Navigate to different sections or fields within the help search.
3. Try using Ctrl+F1 shortcut in each field.
4. Note the inconsistency in its functionality across the various fields.
